main event: A civilian observer reported a sighting of a star-like object changing colors in Eagle Grove, Iowa, between February and April 1954.
interesting points: The object changed colors from orange to green to bright red during the observation., The observer had reported similar sightings before., The sighting lasted approximately 20 minutes., Two reports of the sighting were made., The conclusion suggested it was probably an astronomical object, such as a star or planet.
witness description: civilian observer, reported by a local police officer
